Torrent works great. Changing the language to your preference is simple but I got to the part after the helicoptor and saved so I could quit and change some things. It said it was saving my game, but now whenever I go back it doesn't have a "load game" option. It just has you choose your graphics setting and brightness and starts from the beginning . Anyone else having this problem.

Well I looked it it up and apparently it doesn't matter if it said "Save successful" or whatever. You have to completely beat the entire beginning part of the game where it throws you right in before you get to an actual checkpoint that you can load from. So be prepared to spend at least a good 30-45 minutes playing before you can actually save your progress. Just a heads up. Again, torrent works great. Thanks Hero.

I just installed.  Put nodvd files in to main Steam folder.

Clicked RE6 desktop icon. and it says failed to initialize steam.  FAIL. what am i doing wrong?

Nevermind I put "nodvd" files in the wrong folder.

Ok this is how it goes:
1.Install game.
2.Open Nodvd folder
3.Open steam_rld
4.At bottom erase 'russian' and type english
5.Take two files in nodvd folder and place in
"C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonResident Evil 6BH6.exe"
6.Create shortcut of BH6 and place on desktop and rename RE6
7. ENJOY! :)

Works great! Like any other game, run setup.exe then copy over the cracked files.
It will be in russian until you edit the steam_rld.ini to say ENGLISH.  It is read-only file so you may have to save in another folder and copy it over. Thanks HeroMaster
oh and to get past the graphics options screen you need to hit OK , not ESC

anab0lix, THANK YOU. Your instructions were really clear and helped me. Much better than the instructions in the description.  

*One note though: after I installed it I got an error: "This application has failed to start because D3DX9_43.DLL was not found". If you get this, you have to update your DirectX (even if you have the most recent one). Do it at this link: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35 . After that the game will work, but it takes a while to load up the first time (let it sit though, because the screen will just be black with a different cursor for a while, but it will load up eventually)..

THANKS!!!!

I know that feel when you want to play something you've been waiting for and it just isn't easy.

I love how the game reads xbox controller and also has good mouse/kb controls.  

Game is great in terms of graphics, beautiful cut scenes, and story.  Game play eh, too many of those random buttons things.  Amazing how far they came with games though.

Just beat Leon's campaign in 5 hours.  Give the game 7/10 SO far.

guy's need help it say's  failed open file.C:/Program Files(x86)/cracked steam/steamapps/common/Resident Evil6/nativePC/arc/DX9/uLt0203.arc 2

ATTENTION TO THOSE FACING A BLACK SCREEN ISSUE AFTER LAUNCHING THE GAME


THIS IS HAPPENING TO MANY GAMERS APPARENTLY, SO YOU ARE NOT ALONE


IF YOU GET A BLACK SCREEN WITH THE LOADING CURSOR IN THE MIDDLE

THEN WAIT FOR 5-15 MINS, THE GAME WILL EVENTUALLY LOAD. 

ONCE YOU ARE PAST THE GAME VISUAL SETTINGS, EVERYTHING GOES NORMALLY (THE WAY IT SHOULD BE)



MINE TAKES ABOUT 5-7 MINUTES TO LOAD



IMPORTANT:

EVERY TIME YOU CHANGE THE VISUAL SETTINGS YOU WILL HAVE TO WAIT ANOTHER 5-15 MIN (DEPENDING ON YOUR MACHINE)

SO TRY TO CONFIGURE THE SETTINGS USING THE TEXT DOCUMENT IN YOUR DOCUMENTS FOLDER(CAPCOM/RESIDENT EVIL 6)
